Report: Educate clients that Owners and supervisors and thekedars keep roaming at sites and labours are always at site
Take handover of all drawings and agreements and payment
Ensure that walls from one end to last should be in soot rather than tying soot from column to column
While doing brickwork always put empty bags at sides to avoid wastage of masala
sariye ka ring 90 degree se zyada muda hona chahiye
Ek ring se doosre ring ki doorie max 6 inch honi chahiye
Concrete mix should be cement 3 : Dust 4 : Rodi 6
Concrete mix cement  : Dust  : Rodi ...jaisa mix contract mein mentioned hai wo follow hona hi chahiye
Jab bhi concreting ka kaam chal raha ho rodi, dust , cement kaafi hona chahiye site par
Supervisor must check ki Kisi bhi jhuggi mein faltu mein light na jalti rahe
Only chokidar to stay at site, no other labour and mistri to stayback

Educate the client that he shouldnt have issues with labour at site or his wife and kids. Client shouldnt expect Only chokidar to stay at site, no other labour and mistri to stayback as this will become difficult for us to perform
Supervisor Koi bhi material site par aane se pehle client se sample ok karwaye
Before delievering bricks at site be 100% sure of Mark and quality committed to client
Barish ke karan lift space mein paani bhar jata hai...	Lift space mein Paani nahi hona chahiye
Supervisors must check ki Labour ke clothes sukhaane ke liye fixed place bani ho, main gate par bilkul na sukhaye
Supervisor must check ki Dust road par faili na ho aur hamesha dhaki hui ho
Site par slab casting ki jab shuttering lage usse pehle stairs ki side wall ready karwao aur wall par neel se seedi ke nishan laga lo
Site par jab bhi shuttering chal rahi ho to shuttering material, nails, balli sab hona chahiye
Check shuttering ply not to be swollen or damaged even at edges
On the slab casting day supervisor must ensure that cement, dust, rodi, water drums, water tanker or working boring, generator are well equipped
On slab casting day ensure that all 3 drums are filled with water at all times else when there is no electricity the work gets hampered
Supervisor must remember that Subah dopahar shaam â€¦.kaam ki aur tarai ki photo client group mein dalni hai
Kisi bhi site par kaam shuru karte waqt 3 supervisors ko client group mein add karo taaki koi na koi group mein updates deta rahe
